sk.stuba.fiit.perconik.core

Class AbstractCountingListener

  • java.lang.Object
    • sk.stuba.fiit.perconik.core.AbstractRegistrable
      • sk.stuba.fiit.perconik.core.Adapter
        • sk.stuba.fiit.perconik.core.AbstractCountingListener
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    CountingListener, Listener, Registrable

    public abstract class AbstractCountingListener
extends Adapter
implements CountingListener
    An abstract implementation of CountingListener holding event counts in an atomic map.
    Since:
    1.0
    Author:
    Pavol Zbell
